articles.description: The acquisition of Shop101 gives Glance a strong entry point into mobile ecommerce, which is primarily influencer driven.

articles.author: Capital Market
articles.title: BHEL Q4 net loss narrows to Rs 1,035 cr - Business Standard
articles.description: On a consolidated basis, Bharat Heavy Electricals (BHEL) reported net loss of Rs 1,034.82 crore in Q4 FY21, lower than net loss of Rs 1,532.67 crore in Q4 FY20.
articles.content:
On a consolidated basis, Bharat Heavy Electricals (BHEL) reported net loss of Rs 1,034.82 crore in Q4 FY21, lower than net loss of Rs 1,532.67 crore in Q4 FY20.
Net sales rose 47% to Rs 6,751.88 cro… [+2347 chars]

articles.title: LIC looks to raise up to ₹25,000 crore from anchor investors - Mint
articles.description: Centre may line up two dozen anchor investors for mega IPO.Anchor investors are QIBs who agree to buy shares at a particular price by applying to invest at least  ₹10 cr in the IPO before it opens
articles.content:
